CMS_BRANCH_BREADCRUMBS.title:
<# if('site_id' in bcrumbs){ jsh.System.renderCurrentSite(bcrumbs.site_id, bcrumbs.site_name); } #>
Current Branch:
<#-jsh.XExt.escapeHTML(bcrumbs.branch_desc||'')||' '#>
CMS_BRANCH_BREADCRUMBS.sql: select v_my_branch_desc.branch_id, branch_desc, v_my_branch_desc.site_id, $ifnull(v_my_site.site_name,'(No site selected)') site_name, site_default_page_template_id, site_default_page_filename,sys_user_site_editor, site_editor from {schema}.v_my_branch_desc inner join {schema}.site on site.site_id = v_my_branch_desc.site_id inner join {schema}.v_my_site on v_my_site.site_id = v_my_branch_desc.site_id where v_my_branch_desc.branch_id={schema}.my_current_branch_id()

CMS_BRANCH_BREADCRUMBS_OPTIONAL.title:
<# if('site_id' in bcrumbs){ jsh.System.renderCurrentSite(bcrumbs.site_id, bcrumbs.site_name); } #>
Current Branch:
<#-jsh.XExt.escapeHTML(bcrumbs.branch_desc||'')||'(No branch currently checked out)'#>
CMS_BRANCH_BREADCRUMBS_OPTIONAL.sql: select v_my_current_branch.branch_id, branch_desc, site.site_id, $ifnull(site.site_name,'(No site selected)') site_name, site_default_page_template_id, site_default_page_filename,sys_user_site_editor, site_editor from {schema}.v_my_session left outer join {schema}.site on site.site_id = v_my_session.site_id left outer join {schema}.v_my_site on v_my_site.site_id = v_my_session.site_id left outer join {schema}.v_my_current_branch on v_my_session.site_id = v_my_current_branch.site_id

lov.sql: select site_id code_parent, deployment_target_id code_val, deployment_target_name code_txt from {schema}.v_my_deployment_target where deployment_target_can_editor = 1 and deployment_target_sts='ACTIVE' and site_id = {schema}.my_current_site_id() order by deployment_target_name
